monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: 1000 Leaves
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Shield all allies for 1 x (600 + 75% Defense)

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Elemental Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Fiery Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Glitter
skills.description: Unique Aura: For each instance of "Gold Sense" in the party, every Monster in the party deals 5% more damage and receives 5% less damage.

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Icy Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Leaf Slash
skills.description: 3 x 50% (150%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Charging
skills.description: For every 40 Mana regenerated, gain a Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Potential
skills.description: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Neutral Resistance
skills.description: Neutral damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Ring Focus
skills.description: Ring equipment values are increased by 80%.

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Templar
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Templar Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Templar Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

drops.name: Skill Resetter
drops.description: Resets the skilltree of a Monster
